Room.Name: Middle of the Garden
Room.ShortDescription: You stand at the center of this magnificent garden, before a stone statue.
Room.LongDescription: A statue framed by a white glow--the mystical white mist that fills the garden--stands before you. At the base of this statue there is a brass plate which reads 'Solitude is best'. The statue appears remarkably lifelike and somewhat sad. There are exits to the north, south, east, and west.
